pokedexEntries.red: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.
pokedexEntries.blue: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.
pokedexEntries.yellow: Said to appear in decrepit, deserted buildings. It has no real shape as it appears to be made of a gas.
pokedexEntries.gold: With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.
pokedexEntries.silver: Its thin body is made of gas. It can envelop an opponent of any size and cause suffocation.
pokedexEntries.crystal: It wraps its opponent in its gas-like body, slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it through the skin.
pokedexEntries.ruby: Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this Pokémon cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.
pokedexEntries.sapphire: Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this Pokémon cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.
pokedexEntries.emerald: When exposed to a strong wind, a Gastly's gaseous body quickly dwindles away. They cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.
pokedexEntries.fireRed: A being that exists as a thin gas. It can topple an Indian elephant by enveloping the prey in two seconds.
pokedexEntries.leafGreen: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.
pokedexEntries.diamond: This Pokémon's body is 95% made up of gases, which are blown away by strong gusts of wind.
pokedexEntries.pearl: A Pokémon born from poison gases. It defeats even the largest foes by enveloping them in gas.
pokedexEntries.platinum: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
pokedexEntries.heartGold: With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.
pokedexEntries.soulSilver: Its thin body is made of gas. Despite lacking substance, it can envelop an opponent of any size and cause suffocation.
pokedexEntries.black: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
pokedexEntries.white: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
pokedexEntries.black2: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
pokedexEntries.white2: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
pokedexEntries.x: Its body is made of gas. Despite lacking substance, it can envelop an opponent of any size and cause suffocation.
pokedexEntries.y: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
pokedexEntries.omegaRuby: Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this Pokémon cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.
pokedexEntries.alphaSapphire: Gastly is largely composed of gaseous matter. When exposed to a strong wind, the gaseous body quickly dwindles away. Groups of this Pokémon cluster under the eaves of houses to escape the ravages of wind.
pokedexEntries.sun: Should a strange light be seen flickering in an abandoned building, Gastly is lurking there.
pokedexEntries.moon: Although Gastly is barely visible, when it's near, a faint sweet smell lingers.
pokedexEntries.ultraSun: It’s said that gas emanating from a graveyard was possessed by the grievances of the deceased and thus became a Pokémon.
pokedexEntries.ultraMoon: Poisonous gas comprises 95% of its body. It’s said that the remaining 5% is made up of the souls of those who died from the gas.
